column4: wowsers - did a clean install of Ubuntu 8.04.1  on a machine.. and the first update/upgrade downloads 117mb of updates. :) are they going to have to do a 8.04.2 soon?
Yea but technically its not a LTS.  i was just wondering whats going to happen when the # of updates one has to get  starts  to be the same size as the cd. :)
i dont see what the kernel 'headers'  have to do with the nvidia drivers at all.
